channel.title: Our Courses on Magnificent Math Club
channel.description: Recent content in Our Courses on Magnificent Math Club

item.title: Intermediate Algebra
item.description: Students will learn about the complex numbers and how to solve quadratics and polynomials.

item.title: Pre-Algebra
item.description: Students will learn about fractions, exponents and square roots, prime factorization, divisibility tests, and linear equations and inequalities.

item.title: Number Theory
item.description: Students will learn about number theory including primes, base arithmetic, and modular arithmetic.

item.title: Algebra
item.description: Students will learn about linear equations, quadratic equations, and factoring simple quadratics.

item.title: Beast Academy Grade 5
item.description: Students will learn about solids, integers, equations, statistics, factors, fractions, sequences, ratios, decimals, percents, square roots, and exponents.

item.title: Geometry II
item.description: Students will continue exploration of geometric concepts, such as circles, polygons, and polyhedra.

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: Students will learn the basics of and familiarize themselves with Python programming.

item.title: Geometry I (Triangles)
item.description: Students will learn about congruency, similarity, special points of triangle, and Heronâ€™s formula.
